name: KFC The Hard Way
summary: Colonel Sanders is known the world over as a fried chicken genius because of KFC. But his genius also drives him to ever more startling heights. His latest endeavour is an escape room he engineered in virtual reality. This was the clearest way to communicate exactly what is expected when it comes to making his fried chicken. And he was at last able to give himself the powers he always wanted. Powers like laser eyes and a robot companion. Enter at your own peril, and see if you have what it takes to make KFC Colonel Sanders’ way, the Hard Way.
